scikits.statsmodels.family.family.Gaussian.loglike¶

Gaussian.loglike(Y, mu, scale=1.0)¶

Loglikelihood function for Gaussian exponential family distribution.

Parameters:

Y : array-like

Endogenous response variable

mu : array-like

Fitted mean response variable

scale : float, optional

Scales the loglikelihood function. The default is 1.
Returns:

llf : float

The value of the loglikelihood function evaluated at (Y,mu,scale) as defined below.

scikits.statsmodels.family.family.Gaussian.deviance

Next topic
